players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Charlie.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
Beware, Bob is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "I investigated Alice and found she's mafia. She killed Charlie. Vote her."
You: "I didn't kill Charlie. Bob's investigation is wrong. Maybe Bob is lying."
Diana: "Alice, if you are mafia, why didn't you kill Charlie? Bob says you are mafia. Vote Alice."
Bob: "Alice, you killed Charlie. I investigated you and found you are mafia. Vote Alice."
You: remained silent.
Diana: "I agree with Bob. Alice is mafia. Vote her."

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
You investigated Alice and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Alice knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
You: "I investigated Alice and found she's mafia. She killed Charlie. Vote her."
Alice: "I didn't kill Charlie. Bob's investigation is wrong. Maybe Bob is lying."
Diana: "Alice, if you are mafia, why didn't you kill Charlie? Bob says you are mafia. Vote Alice."
You: "Alice, you killed Charlie. I investigated you and found you are mafia. Vote Alice."
Alice: remained silent.
Diana: "I agree with Bob. Alice is mafia. Vote her."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Alice, Diana voted for Alice (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format)
Alice was arrested
